name: Thành Chung Vũ
about: Seek opportunities to immerse myself in the real energetic working environment, to dedicate to the creation of values towards the company to the fullest as well as to lay concrete foundation for personal future career path in Human Resources field, especially for the segments of Talent Acquistion and HRBP.

experiences.description:
*Learning & Development and Administration (80%):
- Support Talent Development, Culture and Engagement activities (communication, logistics, administration, facilities management & follow-up actions).
- Partake in brainstorming and designing visuals and content of HR Communication publications.
- Involve in employee engagement activities as moderator or content designer.
- Liaise and follow up with external stakeholders and internal departments (Procurement, Facility Management, Finance,…) for L&D activities .
- Ad-hoc support as requested by HR Director and Department.

*Talent Acquisition (20%):
- Facilitate the majority of the process of trainees recruitment for different teams and departments.
 + Liaise with hiring manager to ensure accurate understanding as for hiring needs and requirements
 + Post job descriptions, collect candidate profiles and seek potential leads
 + Conduct phone interview to ensure suitability for further rounds and make arrangements
 + Providing supports to candidates and hiring managers as needed.
